term.title: infrared

item.text: Region of the electromagnetic spectrum extending from 780 nm to about 20000 nm.,According to the CIE, the range between 780 nm and 1 mm is subdivided into:,IR-A 780–1400 nm,IR-B 1.4–3 µm,IR-C 3 µm–1 mm

notes.item: This is the wavelength region in which absorption by a molecular entity causes excitation of its vibrational, rotational, and bending modes.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 354 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
